theorem approx_slp_range_tms: assumes "approx_slp p ord d slp VS = Some X" assumes slp_def: "slp = slp_of_fas fas" assumes d_def: "d = length fas" assumes e: "e \<in> UNIV \<rightarrow> {-1 .. 1}" assumes vs: "vs all_in\<^sub>i range_tms e VS" assumes lens: "\<And>tm. tm \<in> set VS \<Longrightarrow> num_params (tm_poly tm) \<le> length vs" shows "interpret_floatariths fas vs all_in\<^sub>i range_tms e X"
